Frequenzgangfunktion¶

class +AMrotorSIM.+Experiments.@Hochlaufanalyse.Hochlaufanalyse(a, rpm_span, time)¶

Bases: handle

Hochlaufanalyse Class for time integration of run-up

Does time integration for the system with a linearly rising rotational speed

See also AMrotorSIM.Graphs

rotorsystem = None¶

rpm steps

time = None¶

time steps e.g. 0:tStep:tEnd

result = None¶

results-struct: result.X, result.X_d, result.X_dd

Hochlaufanalyse(a, rpm_span, time)¶

obj = Hochlaufanalyse(rotorsystem,rpm_span,time)

+AMrotorSIM.+Experiments.@Hochlaufanalyse.clear_time_result(obj)¶
+AMrotorSIM.+Experiments.@Hochlaufanalyse.compute_ode15s_ss(obj)¶
+AMrotorSIM.+Experiments.@Hochlaufanalyse.show()¶
+AMrotorSIM.+Experiments.@Hochlaufanalyse.private.integrate_function(t, Z, rpm_span, t_span, rotorsystem)¶
+AMrotorSIM.+Experiments.@Hochlaufanalyse.private.odeOutputFcnController(t, y, flag, varargin)¶

rpm_span = varargin{1}; t_span = varargin{2};
